channel.title: Pytorch on Optionally Bayes
channel.description: Recent content in Pytorch on Optionally Bayes

item.title: Monte Carlo Methods for Option Pricing and Greeks
item.description: Using PyTorch to easily compute Option Greeks first using Black-Scholes and then Monte Carlo methods.

item.title: Mixture Density Network for Forecasting Realized Volatility
item.description: Using a mixture density neural network implemented in PyTorch to forecast the distribution of future realized volatility.
